doc:
Barbara Rhoades https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barbara_Rhoades 0 Barbara Rhoades (born March 23, 1946) is an American actress, known primarily for her comedy and mystery roles, especially as lady bandit Penelope "Bad Penny" Cushings in The Shakiest Gun in the West (1968). She had a recurring role on Soap, as Maggie Chandler, Jodie Dallas' future wife. Barbara_Rhoades ( born March_23_,_1946 ) is an_American_actress , known primarily for her_comedy_and_mystery_roles , especially as lady_bandit_Penelope " Bad_Penny_"_Cushings in The_Shakiest_Gun in the_West ( 1968 ) . She had a_recurring_role on Soap , as Maggie_Chandler , Jodie_Dallas '_future_wife .
